title: Audio Event Detection
author: Satyam Singh
description:
This Python project provides a class (AudioDetection) for detecting specific audio events within a larger audio file. It leverages the Short-Time Fourier Transform (STFT) to analyze the frequency content of the audio signals and a similarity-based matching algorithm to identify the occurrence of target events.

Provide BOX links for below inputs.

source_file: File where detection will happen
matching_file: File that is the event

If no files are available to you, use below links of sample files. Before using them in asset, have a listen.
source_file: https://ibm.box.com/s/tj3j60x09krxs9n7bevwm07wett4mz7b
matching_file: https://ibm.box.com/s/zlppoegegja4wzbxe25bpabbelwf9yjv
